Calculate Position Size

Source: R/strategy.R
calc_position_size.Rd

Calculates position size based on various methods (fixed, percent of equity, risk-based, volatility-adjusted, etc.)

Usage

calc_position_size(
  method = "fixed",
  capital,
  price,
  risk_per_trade = 0.02,
  volatility = NULL,
  target_volatility = 0.1,
  ...
)

Arguments

method

Character: "fixed", "percent_equity", "risk_parity", "volatility_target"

capital

Numeric value of available capital

price

Numeric value of asset price

risk_per_trade

Numeric: risk per trade as fraction of capital (for risk-based methods)

volatility

Numeric: asset volatility (for volatility-based methods)

target_volatility

Numeric: target portfolio volatility (default: 0.10)

...

Additional parameters for custom sizing methods

Value

Numeric value representing position size (number of shares/units)

Examples

# Fixed position size
calc_position_size("fixed", capital = 10000, price = 100)
#> [1] 2

# 2% of equity
calc_position_size("percent_equity", capital = 10000, price = 100, risk_per_trade = 0.02)
#> [1] 2

# Volatility-targeted
calc_position_size("volatility_target", capital = 10000, price = 100, 
                   volatility = 0.20, target_volatility = 0.10)
#> [1] 50
